performances.description: Brucey is ON for this version.  Only heard it live once but enjoyed it when the boys broke it out.
The blues version of this Hornsby led beauty. This is a real treat and should have been explored more often. Wonderful
LOVER of all 6 versions. LOVE BRUCE. Can not wait until the shows this summer BRRRRRRRUUUUUCEEEEEE
Tragically this is the last time played, this had potential to be a barn burning set closer during the Hornsby years, nice little piano and guitar jam
Debut of a Hornsby penned tune played by the GratefulDead, not the jamming beast this would become with Bruce's solo bands but still a very enjoyable
